code: import*as actionTypes from"./actionTypes";export function addToCart(cartItem){return{type:actionTypes.ADD_TO_CARD,payload:cartItem};}export function removeFromCart(product){return{type:actionTypes.REMOVE_FORM_CARD,payload:product};}export function backButtonShowStateCart(isShow){debugger;return{type:actionTypes.SHOW_HIDE_BACKBT,payload:isShow};}
